entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 30%
